Instruction: 'Peel the eggplant and cut it into 1-inch cubes.'
'Mince the garlic cloves and juice the lemon.'
In a large bowl, toss the eggplant cubes with olive oil, minced garlic, lemon juice, salt, and black pepper.'
'Spread the seasoned eggplant cubes in a single layer on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.'
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until eggplant is tender and golden brown, stirring halfway through.'
'Remove from the oven and transfer to a serving dish.'
'Garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving.'
